pl.polsl.Szymon.Bartnik.models

Class NumeralSystem

  • java.lang.Object
    • pl.polsl.Szymon.Bartnik.models.NumeralSystem
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BinaryNumeralSystem, DecimalNumeralSystem

    public abstract class NumeralSystem
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract class representing numeral system and implementing methods used for computing representation of numeral systems in other systems.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      NumeralSystem() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      abstract java.lang.String convertFromDecimal(int numberToConvert)
      Converts passed integer number (in decimal system) to the needed numeral system (to the system identified by type of current implementation of the NumeralSystem class).
      abstract java.lang.String convertToSpecifiedNumSystem(java.lang.String numberToConvert, NumeralSystem outputNumeralSystem)
      Converts passed number from numeral system identified by current type of this class.
      abstract java.lang.String getSystemName()
      Gets numeral system full name

    • Method Detail

      • getSystemName

        public abstract java.lang.String getSystemName()
        Gets numeral system full name
        Returns:
        numeral system full name

      • convertToSpecifiedNumSystem

        public abstract java.lang.String convertToSpecifiedNumSystem(java.lang.String numberToConvert,
                                                             NumeralSystem outputNumeralSystem)
                                                      throws java.lang.NumberFormatException,
                                                             java.lang.NullPointerException
        Converts passed number from numeral system identified by current type of this class. to the NumeralSystem identified by passed NumeralSystem implementation object.
        Parameters:
        numberToConvert - number to convert to other numeral system
        outputNumeralSystem - instance of NumeralSystem which represents output numeral system.
        Returns:
        passed number representation in numeral system identified by outputNumeralSystem argument
        Throws:
        java.lang.NumberFormatException - when detected illegal characters in number to convert
        java.lang.NullPointerException - when any of parameters is null

      • convertFromDecimal

        public abstract java.lang.String convertFromDecimal(int numberToConvert)
        Converts passed integer number (in decimal system) to the needed numeral system (to the system identified by type of current implementation of the NumeralSystem class).
        Parameters:
        numberToConvert - number in decimal system which we want to convert to other numeral system.
        Returns:
        input integer number converted to the needed numeral system.
